text: Thomas Cedric Larkin (17 November 1917 â€“ 17 August 2021) was a New Zealand politician. He was the New Zealand ambassador to Japan between 1972 and 1976. He also played representative cricket for Taranaki in the 1930s. He was born in Wellington, New Zealand. Larkin died on 17 August 2021 in Wellington at the age of 103. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ambassadors Category:Politicians from Wellington
title: Tom Larkin (diplomat)
